name: DA Hack
description: De Anza College's first ever virtual hackathon. Responsible for development of the website.

name: All Chess Discord Bot
description: A chess bot for discord that makes organizing games, and practicing chess that much easier.

name: RayTracingPy
description: A cool ray tracer made using Python, that can mainly produce spheres (for now).

name: Tank Game
description: A tank game made using the C++ SFML library. Led project development, which occured during CIS 29, Winter 2021.

name: BYOW
description: A game whose world is completley pseudorandomly generated, with teleporters, keys, and interactions scattered throughout.

name: OpenDoAR
description: An augmented Reality solution for effortless and safe returning to physical places.
